type.name: section
type.title: Short title.
type.context: MOLASSES ACT under Short title. 1. This Act may be cited as the Molasses (Disposal) Act.
type.description: This Act may be cited as the Molasses (Disposal) Act.

type.name: section
type.title: Records of sale and disposal of molasses.
type.context: MOLASSES ACT under Records of sale and disposal of molasses. 2. (1) Every person who except for export from Guyana sells or otherwise disposes of molasses to some other person shall keep at the place of sale or disposal a book (hereinafter referred to as the molasses disposal book) in which he shall record the quantity of molasses sold or disposed of, the date of sale or disposition, the date of delivery, the name and address of the buyer or person to LAWS OF GUYANA 4 Cap. 92:03 Molasses  L.R.O. 1/2012                       No molasses exceeding two gallons to be sold delivered or removed without certificate. [31 of 1937]            Purposes for which  molasses required to be in writing.  [41 of 1933]        Certificate under section 3(2). whom disposed  of  and  of  the  person  to  whom  delivered,  and  the consideration for the sale or disposition, and the purpose for which obtained.  (2) The entries in the  molasses disposal  book shall be made in such manner and form as the Commissioner of Police may from time to time prescribe by notice in the Gazette and a daily newspaper, and shall at all times be open to inspection by any district commissioner, police constable or officer of customs.  (3) Every person who sells or disposes of molasses as aforesaid shall on the first day of every month transmit to the Commissioner  of  Police  an  extract  of  all  entries in  the  molasses disposal book for the preceding month.

description.description: Every person who except for export from Guyana sells or otherwise disposes of molasses to some other person shall keep at the place of sale or disposal a book

The entries in the  molasses disposal  book shall be made in such manner and form as the Commissioner of Police may from time to time prescribe by notice in the Gazette and a daily newspaper, and shall at all times be open to inspection by any district commissioner, police constable or officer of customs.

Every person who sells or disposes of molasses as aforesaid shall on the first day of every month transmit to the Commissioner  of  Police  an  extract  of  all  entries in  the  molasses disposal book for the preceding month.

type.name: section
type.title: No molasses exceeding two gallons to be sold, delivered or removed without certificate.
type.context: MOLASSES ACT under No molasses exceeding two gallons to be sold, delivered or removed without certificate. 3. (1) No person shall on the sale or other disposition of molasses as aforesaid deliver more than two gallons thereof on the same day to any other person unless he shall deliver to that person at the same time a certificate of the sale or other disposition thereof. The Commissioner of Police may subject to the approval of the Minister from time to time prescribe forms of certificates and what they shall contain.  (2) No person shall remove more than two gallons of molasses from the place of sale or disposal unless he has received a certificate as provided by subsection (1).

description.description: No person shall on the sale or other disposition of molasses as aforesaid deliver more than two gallons thereof on the same day to any other person unless he shall deliver to that person at the same time a certificate of the sale or other disposition thereof. The Commissioner of Police may subject to the approval of the Minister from time to time prescribe forms of certificates and what they shall contain.
No person shall remove more than two gallons of molasses from the place of sale or disposal unless he has received a certificate as provided by subsection

type.name: section
type.title: Purposes for which molasses required to be in writing.
type.context: MOLASSES ACT under Purposes for which molasses required to be in writing. 4. Before the delivery of molasses to any person under sections 2 and 3, such person shall state in writing signed by him the purpose for which he desires to obtain the molasses. The statement shall be delivered to and kept by the person who delivers the molasses and shall be open to inspection in the same manner and by the same persons mentioned in section 2 (2).
type.description: Before the delivery of molasses to any person under sections 2 and 3, such person shall state in writing signed by him the purpose for which he desires to obtain the molasses. The statement shall be delivered to and kept by the person who delivers the molasses and shall be open to inspection in the same manner and by the same persons mentioned in section 2 (2).

type.name: section
type.title: Certificate under section 3(2).
type.context: MOLASSES ACT under Certificate under section 3(2). 5. Every certificate delivered under section 3 (2) shall state the purpose for which the molasses has been obtained. type.name: section
type.title: Penalty for use other than that given.
type.context: MOLASSES ACT under Penalty for use other than that given. 6. Any person to whom molasses has been delivered under this Act and who uses it or any part thereof for a purpose other than that set forth in the statement required by section 4 and in the certificate delivered under section 5 shall be liable to a fine of seven hundred and fifty dollars.
type.description: Any person to whom molasses has been delivered under this Act and who uses it or any part thereof for a purpose other than that set forth in the statement required by section 4 and in the certificate delivered under section 5 shall be liable to a fine of seven hundred and fifty dollars.

type.name: section
type.title: Copy of statement delivered under section 4 to be sent to Commissioner of Police.
type.context: MOLASSES ACT under Copy of statement delivered under section 4 to be sent to Commissioner of Police. 7. Every person who transmits an extract of entries in pursuance of section 2(3) shall at the same time transmit to the Commissioner of Police a copy of every statement which has been delivered during the preceding month under section

description.description: shall at the same time transmit to the Commissioner of Police a copy of every statement which has been delivered during the preceding month under section

type.name: section
type.title: Penalty for contravention of Act.
type.context: MOLASSES ACT under Penalty for contravention of Act. 8. (1) Any person who contravenes any of the provisions of sections 2, 3 and 6 shall be liable to a fine of one thousand five hundred dollars and if convicted of a second or subsequent offence to a fine of three thousand dollars or to imprisonment for six months.  (2) Where any person is convicted in respect of the sale or other disposition or the delivery or  removal  of  any  molasses  in contravention of any of the provisions of this Act the molasses shall be forfeited.

description.description: Any person who contravenes any of the provisions of sections 2, 3 and 6 shall be liable to a fine of one thousand five hundred dollars and if convicted of a second or subsequent offence to a fine of three thousand dollars or to imprisonment for six months.

Where any person is convicted in respect of the sale or other disposition or the delivery or  removal  of  any  molasses  in contravention of any of the provisions of this Act the molasses shall be forfeited.

type.name: section
type.title: Power of arrest without warrant in certain cases.
type.context: MOLASSES ACT under Power of arrest without warrant in certain cases. 9. Any person who acts in contravention of section 3 may be arrested without warrant by any district commissioner, police constable or officer of customs.
type.description: Any person who acts in contravention of section 3 may be arrested without warrant by any district commissioner, police constable or officer of customs.
